languages.text: "Потому что такова твоя природа. Элантах, чужестран{mf|ец|ка} из тьмы среди звезд. Ты спустил{mf|ся|ась} сюда на огненных крыльях машины в темное время, когда воздух планеты пропитан кровью и болью... будешь ли ты т{mf|ем|ой}, кто принесет ей покой?"

"Because that is what you are. Elantach means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"
languages.original_text: "Потому что такова твоя природа. Элантах, чужестран{mf|ец|ка} из тьмы среди звезд. Ты спустил{mf|ся|ась} сюда на огненных крыльях машины в темное время, когда воздух планеты пропитан кровью и болью... будешь ли ты т{mf|ем|ой}, кто принесет ей покой?"

traits.locale_text: "Because that is what you are. El'antar means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

"Because that is what you are. El'antar means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

"Because that is what you are. El'antar means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

"Because that is what you are. Elantach means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

languages.text: “因为你就是这样的人。‘外界人’这个词，指的是从群星的黑暗之中到来的陌生人。这颗行星的空气浸泡在鲜血与痛苦之中。在这晦暗的日子里，你乘着带着火焰之翼的机械来到此地……你会是那个为莉莱赞带来和平的人吗？”
languages.original_text: "Because that is what you are. Elantach means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: “因为你就是这样的人。‘外界人’这个词，指的是从群星的黑暗之中到来的陌生人。这颗行星的空气浸泡在鲜血与痛苦之中。在这晦暗的日子里，你乘着带着火焰之翼的机械来到此地……你会是那个为莉莱赞带来和平的人吗？”

languages.text: «Porque es lo que eres. Elantach significa desconocido de la oscuridad entre las estrellas. Has descendido en máquinas con alas de fuego en una época oscura, cuando el aire del planeta está empapado de sangre y dolor... ¿Serás quien traiga la paz al Lilaethan?».
languages.original_text: "Because that is what you are. Elantach means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: «Porque es lo que eres. Elantach significa desconocido de la oscuridad entre las estrellas. Has descendido en máquinas con alas de fuego en una época oscura, cuando el aire del planeta está empapado de sangre y dolor... ¿Serás quien traiga la paz al Lilaethan?».

languages.text: 「あなたを指す言葉だ。エランタとは、星々の闇のからきた者。あなた達は炎の翼を持つ機械に押しかけている。この星の空気が血と苦痛にまみれているという、大変な時代に…。リラエタンに平和をもたらすつもりはあるのか？」
languages.original_text: "Because that is what you are. Elantach means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたを指す言葉だ。エランタとは、星々の闇のからきた者。あなた達は炎の翼を持つ機械に押しかけている。この星の空気が血と苦痛にまみれているという、大変な時代に…。リラエタンに平和をもたらすつもりはあるのか？」

languages.text: "Weil Ihr genau das seid. 'Elantach' bedeutet '{mf|Fremder|Fremde} aus der Finsternis der Sterne'. Ihr seid in einer finsteren Zeit auf Maschinen mit Feuerflügeln herabgestiegen, als die Luft des Planeten in Blut und Schmerz getränkt ist ... Werdet Ihr Lileath Frieden bringen?"
languages.original_text: "Because that is what you are. Elantach means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: "Weil Ihr genau das seid. 'Elantach' bedeutet '{mf|Fremder|Fremde} aus der Finsternis der Sterne'. Ihr seid in einer finsteren Zeit auf Maschinen mit Feuerflügeln herabgestiegen, als die Luft des Planeten in Blut und Schmerz getränkt ist ... Werdet Ihr Lileath Frieden bringen?"

languages.text: « Parce que c'est ce que vous êtes. Elantach signifie "étranger venant des ténèbres parmi les étoiles". Vous êtes {mf|descendu|descendue} du ciel à bord de machines aux ailes de feu en cette heure sombre où le sang et la souffrance inondent la planète... Est-ce vous qui ramènerez la paix sur la lilaethan ? »
languages.original_text: "Because that is what you are. Elantach means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: « Parce que c'est ce que vous êtes. Elantach signifie "étranger venant des ténèbres parmi les étoiles". Vous êtes {mf|descendu|descendue} du ciel à bord de machines aux ailes de feu en cette heure sombre où le sang et la souffrance inondent la planète... Est-ce vous qui ramènerez la paix sur la lilaethan ? »

languages.original_text: "Because that is what you are. Elantach means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

languages.text: "Çünkü öylesin. Elantach, yıldızlar arasındaki karanlıktan gelen yabancı anlamına gelir. Gezegenin göğünün kan ve acıya bulandığı karanlık bir zamanda, alevden kanatları olan makinelerinle geldin. Lilaethan'da barışı sağlayacak kişi sen mi olacaksın?"
languages.original_text: "Because that is what you are. Elantach means stranger from the darkness amidst the stars. You descended on flame-winged machines in a dark time, when the air of the planet is soaked in blood and pain... Will you be the one to bring peace to the Lilaethan?"

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü öylesin. Elantach, yıldızlar arasındaki karanlıktan gelen yabancı anlamına gelir. Gezegenin göğünün kan ve acıya bulandığı karanlık bir zamanda, alevden kanatları olan makinelerinle geldin. Lilaethan'da barışı sağlayacak kişi sen mi olacaksın?"
